# Guardian Spirit, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]] \[[[Incarnum Spells|incarnum]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 13]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF (E)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Up to one creature/level

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 101

As *[[Guardian Spirit (Spell)|guardian spirit]]*, except as noted above. Each target must activate his own *[[Guardian Spirit (Spell)|guardian spirit]]* separately.
